name: Gunny (Gunny games)
description:
Gunny is a third-person shooter set in a magical world where players can obtain different Inugis.

Humans were in peace and harmony, enjoying the facilities provided by the magic of the Inugi.But the human being is complex and after discovering a ruin that showed how the inugis were created. A war for power and domination began. Since whoever possesses the elemental gem could dominate the inugis and their magic.

If you want to try the game you must pre-register on our website. With this same email you can log in
https://www.gunny.games/

All your comments and feedback will be welcome.

buttons:
WASD: Walk
Shift: Run
left click: Shoot
Q:Change Weapon
E: Inugi Hability

Gameplay:
